name: Write Binary File
semantic_context: Writes a binary file to disk
natural_language_description: 这是 Write Binary File 节点。主要用于: Writes a binary file to disk

fileName.name: fileName
fileName.description: Path to which the file should be written
fileName.natural_language_description: 参数名: File Name | 作用: Path to which the file should be written | (必填项)

dataPropertyName.name: dataPropertyName
dataPropertyName.description: Name of the binary property which contains the data for the file to be written
dataPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Property Name | 作用: Name of the binary property which contains the data for the file to be written | 默认值: data | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: append (值: None) - Whether to append to an existing file
